duties_responsibilities.duty: Serve as a mobility assistant and optimize patient mobility using specialized patient-lifting equipment.
Manage the nurse call system needs, answering telephones, stocking supplies/equipment, filing, and ensuring a clean and uncluttered environment of care.
Provide nursing support to achieve the organization's mission of excellent patient care.

education_certification.credential: High school graduate or equivalent; college degree preferred.
Demonstrated strong oral and written communication skills.
Demonstrated excellence in public contact skills (respect for others, courteous, tactfulness).
Demonstrated ability to problem solve, prioritize and display initiative.
Dependability and ability to accept direction and interact with others as a team member essential.
Strong organizational skills with demonstrated ability to work independently.
